product_details_and_care:
A short-sleeve tee with a flattering rounded-V neckline is a wardrobe essential, and we think you'll adore this lightweight jersey version offered in a variety of colors and prints.
29 1/2" length (size 2X)
Rounded-V neckline
Short sleeves
Chest pocket
60% cotton, 40% modal
Machine wash cold, dry flat
